issue.title: [C++] Validate cmake script resolving of 3rd party linked libs from correct location in toolchain build
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1233](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1233). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Extend Appveyor build with job to validate resolving of linked libs in toolchain by cmake script.
This should help quickly discover new issues with toolchain build.
